title: Digital Learning Content Management and Instructional Design Process Optimization

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: Strengthening practical math competencies using smartphone-based microlearning content in limited-technology environments.

learning_goals: Learners can understand and apply the structure of digital learning content (learning scenarios, user profiles, instructional architecture).
Learners can design and manage mobile-based microlearning content in constrained technological environments.
Learners can implement instructional strategies for solving mathematical problems in corporate settings based on learning scenarios.
Learners can measure and improve their competency in managing digital learning content through summative assessments.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
